sentences.en: Asked his nationality, he said British.
sentences.cn: 被问及国籍时，他说是英国。

sentences.en: Autumn treats all humans alike , regardless of nationality, race or class.
sentences.cn: 秋之于人, 何尝有国别,更何尝有人种阶级的区别呢?

sentences.en: Can you produce any proof of your nationality?
sentences.cn: 你能出示有关你国藉的任何证件 吗 ?

sentences.en: Discrimination by employers on the grounds of race and nationality was illegal.
sentences.cn: 雇主以种族或国籍为由歧视员工是非法的。

sentences.en: He was indeed a nomad of no nationality.
sentences.cn: 他的确是个无国籍的游民.

sentences.en: Rob may be entitled to dual nationality.
sentences.cn: 罗布或许能拥有双重国籍。

sentences.en: She has never given up her nationality. Even so, her opponents argue that she is not a true Burmese.
sentences.cn: 她从未放弃过她的国籍。即便如此，反对者仍然说她不是真正的缅甸人。

sentences.en: She lives in France but has British nationality.
sentences.cn: 她住在法国但拥有英国国籍.

sentences.en: the different nationalities within the former USSR
The Yi nationality is distributed mainly over Yunnan, Sichuan and Guizhou provinces.
sentences.cn: 彝族主要分布在云南 、 四川和贵州三省.

sentences.en: There is a relationship between your blood type and your nationality.
sentences.cn: 你的血型与民族是有联系的.

sentences.en: They're trying to enact a " nationality " bill.
sentences.cn: 他们正试图通过一项 “ 国籍 ” 法案.

sentences.en: We were both of the same nationality.
sentences.cn: 我们俩是同一国籍的人.

sentences.en: What other nationality is chugging around in the South China Sea?
sentences.cn: 还有哪国船只在南中国海突突突地开来开去?

words.tran_cn: 国家的；国民的；民族的；国立的
民族主义的（等于nationalistic）；国家主义的；民族独立主义的
本国的；土著的；天然的；与生俱来的；天赋的
全国性地；以国民立场地；举国一致地
民族主义；国家主义；民族特性
民族主义者；国家主义者；民族独立主义者
把…收归国有；使具有某国国籍；使成国家
使国有化；使民族化；使归化；使成国家
民族主义,爱国主义,民族精神

trans.tran_cn: 国籍，（构成国家一部分的）民族
trans.tran_en: the state of being legally a citizen of a particular country
